name: Chardonnay, Pinot Grigio, Sauvignon Blanc, Riesling, Moscato, White Zinfandel, White Merlot
Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Shiraz, Pinot Noir, SULA Shiraz (Indian)
JOSH Chardonnay Half Bottle (CALIFORNIA)
description: The nose exudes aromas of tropical fruits, and citrus married with subtle oak notes The palate is bright and fresh, with lingering flavors of juicy yellow peaches, lemon oil and creme brulee The wine shows great, soft texture and finishes long.

name: SEQUOIA GROOVE Chardonnay (CALIFORNIA) (New)
description: This napa valley full bodied wine with crisp citrus fruit flavors, a creamy palate and superb structure.

name: HESS Chardonnay (CALIFORNIA)
description: Crisp and clean low oak Chardonnay showcases the vivid fruit flavors from California's Monterey County vineyards. This wine offers tropical aromas of grilled pineapple with a hint of lemon zest. Nicely balanced medium-bodied with layers of sliced peaches and golden delicious apples.

name: SULA Sauvignon Blanc (INDIA)
description: Cold fermented highly aromatic, floral dry wine with a touch of spice at the finish.

name: MALBOROUGH Sauvignon Blanc (NEW ZEALAND)
description: It exhibits typical Malborough gooseberry and citrus characteristics with crisp refreshing acidity.

name: LEONARD KREUSCH Riesling (GERMANY) (New)
description: This medium sweet Mosel riesling offers hints of green apple and pear with a touch of citrus on the finish.

name: SEAGLASS Riesling (CALIFORNIA) (New)
description: This medium sweet Mosel riesling offers hints of green apple and pear with a touch of citrus on the finish.

name: VOGA Pinot Grigio (ITALY)
description: The soft alluring flavors of Veneto unite perfectly with the structure of Trentino for a rich, full flavored with aromas of ripe apple and pears, with a suggestion of white flowers. Light, clean palate.

name: SANTA CHRISTINA Pinot Grigio (ITALY) (New)
description: It is a balanced, soft, savory and pleasant wine. This wine has fruity aromas of pineapple, green apple along with hints of orange zest.

name: JOSH CELLARS Cabernet Sauvignon Half Bottle (CALIFORNIA)
description: The nose bursts with aromas of intense dark fruits, cinnamon, clove and subtle oak aromas. The palate is dominated by flavors of black cherries and blackberries, accented by vanilla and toasty oak finishing long with round, soft tannins.

name: CAKEBREAD CELLARS Cabernet Sauvignon (CALIFORNIA)
description: Aromas of ripe blackberry, boysenberry, dark chocolate and notes of oak precede balanced acidity and firm tannins. With forward fruit, and welcome mineral undertones, Aged for 17 months (50% new french oak, 50% neutral).

name: JUSTIN Cabernet Sauvignon (CALIFORNIA) (New)
description: It is beautifully balanced with aromas of black fruit and spices. This wine spends fourteen months in traditional small oak barrels to impart depth and complexity.

name: GREG NORMAN Cabernet Sauvignon (AUSTRALIA)
description: This wine is deep ruby red in color. Aromas of blackberry, black cherry and some dried herbal notes are highlighted by hints of roasted coffee. Flavors of black currant and lush, ripe plum are delivered on a silky mouthfeel with smooth tannins and a well-balanced finish.

name: SULA Shiraz (INDIA)
description: Ripe cherry and plum fruit with peppery notes mark this smooth, medium - bodied red wine.

name: HAUT DE BUISSON Cotes Du Rhone (FRANCE)
description: Raspberry and rose petal aromas open to cherry, plum and baking spice flavors. This wine shows great finesse, with a perfect balance of fruit and structure.

name: DONA SILVINA Organic Malbec (ARGENTINA)
description: Wild cherry and caramel full bodied with mature and soft tannins deep red and violets hints.

name: BACKYARD LEAF Pinot Noir (CHILE)
description: Light red in color with fresh medium acidity. The nose of strawberry, spices and vanilla. This wine has a perfect balance of tannins and acidity.
